comments.body: have you considered drawRRect + image + paragraph. That seems to be most common in many apps. (card with image on the left, text on the right)

I looked at `drawImage`, but it turns out to be identical to `drawParagraph` as far as paint bounds are concerned (both are just boxes with an offset), so there's no difference in the benchmark because it does not actually render the picture, only measures the cost of recording.
